nodes.text: Henni was a female Twi'lek who during the Cold War lived on Tython illegally among the Pilgrims. She was one of many Pilgrims who followed Matriarch Kolovish to Tython in the aftermath of the Great Galactic War and the enslavement of Ryloth by the Hutt Cartels.

Henni only appears Star Wars: The Old Republic if the Jedi Consular makes a Dark Side choice and kills Allia during the class mission "Rajivari's Legacy" on Tython. In this case, Henni will take her place during the player's confrontation with Nalen Raloch at the Forge.
